channel.title: Bunch of stuff for trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bunch of stuff for trade"

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded: Actually, I no longer need those, but I want to trade Fur Squares for Crystal Lens, ~ 15 per 1 lense.

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded: @ Jolan - how many ash-covered rare shafts or ash covered shafts do you want for your fur squares?

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded: @Chiputo - I'll trade 100 for a codec, but you do have to have 2 codecs in order to trade one

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded:
@DevilSF - SS? Glad to give a Sham for 4 normal Shafts, and 2 Rare.
@Chiputo - 1 Ash-Covered Rune = 10 fur squares is what I'm interested in, same rate as QDarthGE.

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded:
if PHSR is party house super rare then ill trade a codec for 100 :)
(can u trade items that u only have one of?)

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded:
@Jolan - I'll give you 10 Ash-Covered Rare Shafts for your 6 sham rocks.

@Chiputo - I also have fur squares for trade (150+). Here is my rate:
1 Ash-Covered Rune = 10 fur squares
Ninja Dog = 20 fur squares
Super Potion = 25 fur squares
Ninja Puppet/Giant Fan = 25 fur squares
Crystal Lens/Gold Coin/Small Ruby = 25 fur squares
Small Diamond = 50 fur squares
PHSR = 100 fur squares

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded:
i have an SS

and how many shafts for 2 shams?

item.title: Re: Bunch of stuff for trade
Bunch of stuff for trade
item.content:encoded:
Ash-Covered Tile: 20
Fur Square: 71
Crystal Lens: 1
Sham Rock: 6
Smokestack: 20

Some fairly usable items I'm looking to trade for Rare and Non-Rare Ash Covered Shafts.

Or an Ocelot Rune + something for a Snake Rune, if that's a fair trade.
